类的使用
frogger.model.Score

  • 使用Score的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    frogger.controller  
    frogger.model  
    frogger.service  

    • frogger.controller中Score的使用

      声明为Score的frogger.controller中的字段 
      修饰符和类型 字段 说明
      private Score GameController.score
      The Score of current game
      类型参数类型为Score的frogger.controller中的字段 
      修饰符和类型 字段 说明
      private java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Score> GameController.popupScoreList
      A temporary LinkedHashMap store the high score of each round.
      private java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,​Score> ScoreListController.scoreList
      The list of score list read from file
      (专用程序包) java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,​Score> ScoreListControllerTest.scoreList
      A LinkedHashMap store the nickName and corresponding score
      返回变量类型为Score的类型的frogger.controller中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,​Score> ScoreListController.sortScoreList​(java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,​Score> scoreList)
      This method will sort the input scoreList in descending order (by comparing the Score value) and return the sorted scoreList.
      类型变量类型为Score的frogger.controller中的方法参数 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      void PopupController.setPopupScoreList​(java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Score> scoreList)
      This method is called by SceneSwitch.switchToPopup(LinkedHashMap) every time when the frog lose its life and show the each round of score to the screen.
      java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,​Score> ScoreListController.sortScoreList​(java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,​Score> scoreList)
      This method will sort the input scoreList in descending order (by comparing the Score value) and return the sorted scoreList.

    • frogger.model中Score的使用

      声明为Score的frogger.model中的字段 
      修饰符和类型 字段 说明
      (专用程序包) Score ScoreTest.scoreAdd
      A Score which is used to test the function of addScore(int)
      (专用程序包) Score ScoreTest.scoreSub
      A Score which is used to test the function of subScore(int)

    • frogger.service中Score的使用

      类型参数类型为Score的frogger.service中的字段 
      修饰符和类型 字段 说明
      private java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,​Score> ScoreListReader.scoreList
      A LinkedHashMap store the nickName and corresponding score which from socreList file
      返回变量类型为Score的类型的frogger.service中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,​Score> ScoreListReader.getScoreList()
      returns the scoreList read from file and will be used to print to the screen by ScoreListController.
      参数类型为Score的frogger.service中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      void SceneSwitch.switchToScoreList​(java.lang.String status, Score score)
      Switch the current scene to ScoreList
      void ScoreListWriter.writeInFile​(java.lang.String nickName, Score score, java.lang.String fileURL)
      Writes the given Score and nickName to the socreList file
      类型变量类型为Score的frogger.service中的方法参数 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      void SceneSwitch.switchToPopup​(java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Score> popupScoreList)
      Open the Popup stage and transmit the current score list of each round to PopupController
